repeating-notes.weeklyNoteMask.description: The mask to use for creating the weekly note. See: https://www.npmjs.com/package/dateformat#user-content-mask-options for more information.

repeating-notes.monthlyNoteMask.description: The mask to use for creating the monthly note. See: https://www.npmjs.com/package/dateformat#user-content-mask-options for more information.
